蠭字的基本解释

fēng
同“蜂”。

蠭字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蠭； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页1103第01
〔古文〕?【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?敷容切，音丰。【說文】飛蟲，螫人者。【詩·商頌】莫予荓蠭。【左傳·僖二十二年】蠭蠆有毒。【爾雅·釋蟲】蠭，醜螸。【又】土蠭。【註】江東呼大蠭在地中作房者爲土蠭，啖其子，卽馬蠭。【又】木蠭。【註】似土蠭而小，在樹上作房，江東亦呼爲木蠭，又食其子。【爾雅翼】蜂種類至多，其黃色細?者，謂之穉蜂。又蜜蜂，人收而養之，一日兩出而聚鳴，號爲兩衙，其出採花者，取花鬚上粉置兩髀，或採而無所得，經宿不敢歸房中。　又旗名。【左傳·哀二年】獲其蠭旗。　又舟名。【拾遺記】武王伐紂，有蠭狀如丹鳥，飛集王舟，翼日南梟紂，名其船曰蠭舟。　又星名。【前漢·天文志】杓端有二星，一內爲矛招搖，一外爲盾天蠭。　又地名。【拾遺記】燃丘國獻比翼鳥，使者經蠭岑。　又與鋒通。【前漢·韓王信傳】及其蠭東向，可以爭天下。【師古註】蠭，鋒同。　【長箋】逢二虫，會遭遇毒蟲，意寓戒心也。隷書傳省作蜂。【埤雅】蜂，其毒在尾，垂穎如鋒，故謂之蜂也。【集韻】本作蠭，或作

Beetle
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蠭; Kangxi Strokes: 23; Page Number: Page 1103 No. 01
[Ancient text]? [Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Fu Rongqie, sound abundant. 【Said the text】Flying insects, sting people. 【Poetry·Commercial Song】Mo Yu Xing Zhi. [Zuo Zhuan·Xi Twenty-two Years] Jianqi is poisonous. 【Erya·Release insects】Zhi, ugly. [Also] Earthworm. [Note] Jiangdong calls big beetles to make houses in the ground as soil beetles, and their sons and horses and beetles. [Also] Mu Jian. [Note] It is small and small like the earthworm, making a house on the tree, Jiangdong is also called the woodworm, and eats its children. [Erya Wing] There are many types of bees, and the yellow ones are thinners, which are called scorpion bees. Also bees, people adopt and raise them. They come out twice a day and congregate. They are called two yams. Those who pick flowers will take the flowers and place them on both sides, or they will not get any income, and they dare not return to the house.　Also the name of the flag. [Zuo Zhuan·The Second Year of Amour] Obtained his Zhiqi flag.　Also the name of the boat. [Supplementary Notes] King Wu cuts down the boat, with a beetle shaped like a pill bird, flies to the king boat, and the wing of the south owl, whose name is the boat is called the boat.　Also star name. [Previous Han·Astronomy] There are two stars at the bottom of the dipper, one inside is a spear swagger, and the other outside is a shield skyworm.　Also place name. [Supplementary Notes] Burning Qiu Kingdom presents lovebirds, and the messenger passes by Jian Cen.　Connect with Feng again. [Xin Chuan of the former Han·Han Wang] and its Jiandongxiang, can contend for the world. [Shigu Note] Jian, Fengtong.　【Long Note】Whenever there are two worms, you will encounter poisonous worms, which means wariness. Li Shu Chuan province as a bee. [Piya] A bee, its poison is in the tail, and its peak is like a front, so it is also called a bee. [Ji Yun] This is a 蠭, or
